overview:
Sanjeev co-founded cinesprite.com, India’s first online DVD rentals business. He is currently heading simplymarry.com, a TBSL venture.

Coming from leading jeevansathi.com, a matrimonials online classified by Info-edge, he comes across as a seasoned professional having set up businesses on both offline and online market space.

He has also worked with Dupont and strategised its entry into the Indian market.

He is reachable at Linkedin, http://in.linkedin.com/pub/sanjeev-kumar/1/995/555

image.attribution: Sanjeev kumar lal, simply marry, Times, TBSL
